    • Field Detail

      • b_wireless_network_switch

        private ImageToggleButton b_wireless_network_switch
        Switch button that enables or disables wireless network Android service. On click it call method toggleWirelessNetwork_onClick(View).

      • b_bluetooth_switch

        private ImageToggleButton b_bluetooth_switch
        Switch button that enables or disables wireless network Android service. On click it call method toggleBluetooth_onClick(View).

      • connectionServiceResponseReceiver

        private ConnectionServiceResponseReceiver connectionServiceResponseReceiver
        Receiver for ConnectionService. Object receives data from ConnectionService that invokes some actions on this activity. In this case receiver will call pop-ups on connection established.

      • intentFilter

        private IntentFilter intentFilter
        Filter for {connectionServiceResponseReceiver. Filter that prevents this activity receiver for receiving any other IntentService's data, sending back on ContextWrapper.sendBroadcast(Intent) except Intent passes that flirt.

      • activity

        private Activity activity
        Root activity for this fragment.

      • toggleBluetooth_onClick

        public void toggleBluetooth_onClick(View view)
        Enable or disable bluetooth connection service on Android device. Method runs ConnectionService that will handle all requested work in background. It will try to find previously used bluetooth connection (if any has been saved) and connect to id in background or just returns prompt that will inform user about no default wireless network, asking user what application should do next.
        Parameters:
        view - Default parameter.

      • sendToggleBluetoothIntentToService

        private void sendToggleBluetoothIntentToService(boolean toggle)
        Prepares Intent and passes it to new service triggered by ContextWrapper.startService(Intent) method. Newly created Intent has two extras:
        1. ConnectionService.INPUT_DATA_CALLED_REASON - Integer value that defines a behavior of ConnectionService that will be called.
        2. ConnectionService.INPUT_DATA_CONNECTION_SWITH - boolean value which is true when user switches button from OFF to ON, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        toggle - ON or OFF boolean status of b_bluetooth_switch button after tapped. Gives a value for ConnectionService.INPUT_DATA_CONNECTION_SWITH extra.

      • toggleWirelessNetwork_onClick

        public void toggleWirelessNetwork_onClick(View view)
        Enable or disable wireless connection service on Android device. Method runs ConnectionService that will handle all requested work in background. It will try to find previously used network (if any has been saved) and connect to id in background or just returns prompt that will inform user about no default wireless network, asking user what application should do next.
        Parameters:
        view - Default parameter.

      • sendToggleWirelessNetworkSwitchIntentToService

        private void sendToggleWirelessNetworkSwitchIntentToService(boolean toggle)
        Prepares Intent and passes it to new service triggered by ContextWrapper.startService(Intent) method. Newly created Intent has two extras:
        1. ConnectionService.INPUT_DATA_CALLED_REASON - TODO
        2. ConnectionService.INPUT_DATA_CONNECTION_SWITH - boolean value which is true when user switches button from OFF to ON, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        toggle - ON or OFF boolean status of b_wireless_network_switch button after tapped. Gives a value for ConnectionService.INPUT_DATA_CONNECTION_SWITH extra.

      • initConnectionCheck

        private void initConnectionCheck()

      • initB_wireless_network_switch

        private void initB_wireless_network_switch(int id)
        Initialize method that links b_wireless_network_switch object with correct View by id. Also sets to it View.OnClickListener instead of XML property android:onClick to avoid application for looking onClick method in fragment's root activity.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of view in R

      • initB_bluetooth_switch

        private void initB_bluetooth_switch(int id)
        Initialize method that links b_bluetooth_switch object with correct View by id. Also sets to it View.OnClickListener instead of XML property android:onClick to avoid application for looking onClick method in fragment's root activity.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of view in R
